BodyName: Committee on Civil and Human Rights
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Technology

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Technology
Oversight - The Use of Biometric Identification Systems in New York City.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - The Use of Biometric Identification Systems in New York City.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to prohibiting places or providers of public accommodation from using biometric recognition technology and protecting any biometric identifier information collected
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting places or providers of public accommodation from using biometric recognition technology and protecting any biometric identifier information collected.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to limiting the use of facial recognition technology in residential buildings
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Limiting the use of facial recognition technology in residential buildings.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign, S.6924A/A.8347A, which establishes a task force on missing women and girls who are Black, Indigenous and people of color.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishes a task force on missing women and girls who are Black, Indigenous and people of color. (S.6924A/A.8347A)

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Gutierrez, Abreu, Rivera, Holden, Paladino, Hanif, Won, Kagan, Brewer and  Sanchez

Items.Title: Oversight - The Use of Biometric Identification Systems in New York City.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - The Use of Biometric Identification Systems in New York City.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to prohibiting places or providers of public accommodation from using biometric recognition technology and protecting any biometric identifier information collected
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting places or providers of public accommodation from using biometric recognition technology and protecting any biometric identifier information collected.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to limiting the use of facial recognition technology in residential buildings
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Limiting the use of facial recognition technology in residential buildings.
